tasks.scriptContent:
import os
import sys

sys.path.insert(0,AVX::DEPENDENCIES)
sys.path.insert(0,AVX::HELPER)

import appviewx
import Decrypt_Python3 as Decrypt
import time
connect_db = appviewx.db_connection()
db = connect_db.appviewx

null = None

device_list='<%device_list%>'
policy_name='<%policy_name%>'

def PA_policy_deletion():
	AVX::CMD(device_list+':@'+ 'delete rulebase security rules ' + policy_name)

if __name__ == '__main__':
	AVX::CMD(device_list + ':@' + 'configure')
	PA_policy_deletion()
	AVX::CMD(device_list + ':@' + 'commit')
	config = {}
	config['implementation'] = AVX::CONFIG
	AVX::LOG('Implementation config generated: '+str(config['implementation']))	
	AVX::OUTPUT(config)
